nobvisual package¶

Nob Visual Package

Submodules¶

nobvisual.cli module¶

command line of nobvisualizee

nobvisual.nob2nstruct module¶

Module to convert a Nested object to a Nob-struct object

Nob struc is a description of a Nob compatible with a Circular packing representation

nobvisual.nob2nstruct.build_nstruct(nob)¶

Build the nested_structure of a nested object

Parameters

nob – a nested object

nested dicts of type {

“id”: name, “datum”: 1., <- tot nb of children “path”: path, <_full path to this item “color”: level, <- the level for now “children:[] <- if children list of nesting here

} in a list.

nobvisual.tkinter_circlify module¶

module to browse a circlify object with tkinter

nobvisual.tkinter_circlify.tkcirclify(circlify, holder=None, color='#777777', shade=0.2)¶

Generate a Circlify in aTkinter canvas

nobvisual.visualtree module¶

Module to draw the circular packing of a folder tree

nobvisual.visualtree.scan_wdir(wdir)¶

build the strucutre of a folder tree

nobvisual.visualtree.visual_tree(wdir=None)¶

Show the circular paking of a directory tree
